definition: A formal document that serves as evidence or proof of an accomplishment, qualification, or legal transaction. It is commonly used to certify achievements, academic degrees, professional qualifications, or to authenticate legal agreements.

examples.german: Er erhielt eine Urkunde für seine herausragenden Leistungen.
examples.english: He received a certificate for his outstanding achievements.

examples.german: Die Urkunde bestätigt die erfolgreiche Teilnahme am Kurs.
examples.english: The certificate confirms the successful completion of the course.

examples.german: Die Urkunde wird im Rahmen einer feierlichen Zeremonie verliehen.
examples.english: The certificate is awarded during a solemn ceremony.

examples.german: Die Urkunde ist ein offizielles Dokument.
examples.english: The certificate is an official document.
